website_summaries.verdict: This 17-piece set has pieces that are perfect for small jobs with an air compressor, and the kit comes at a significant value.
pros: Includes adapters for accessories, which is helpful
Easy to use for beginners and those more experienced with air compressors
Pieces are sturdy and durable enough for repeated use
Ideal for home use rather than in a shop
cons: Users should invest in Teflon tape to use with this kit to prevent leaks

customer_reviews.title: No Brass as indicated by description and photo.
customer_reviews.text: At the moment I only wish to say the description and photo are incorrect. It states and shows there are brass pieces included with this kit. There are NO brass pieces in this product. I have yet to put anything together as yet to check proper seal, so I may need to update my review. UPDATE: No leaks with this kit. Be sure to use tape. I just used a basic plumbers tape on the threads and pressure holds on each piece. Still disappointed they claim brass parts. They won't even reply..... Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: LesT

customer_reviews.title: All the parts leak
customer_reviews.text: Well, all of the parts leak. I guess I should have known better, but CH is generally known for making better products than this. I have one of their pancake compressors I purchased 8 years ago, and the fittings for that all work just fine with no leaks. I bought this kit to expand my accessories to go with the new compressor I got. Can't recommend this set at all. Also it doesn't say in the description that the blow gun is limited to 90 psi - you don't find that info out until after you open it up. I'm returning this and will purchase a different kit.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: fits my needs & great price
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Campbell Hausfeld compressor that I don’t use much. When I do use it, it’s for light-duty, easy stuff like inflating tires (automobile and bicycle) or pool toys. For that sort of usage, this kit is fine. The pieces aren’t the most air-tight but it works and the price ($14.48) was great.
customer_reviews.author: PC MountainTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is made CHEAP!. The tire inflator almost feels like plastic and had issues filling a portable air tank, barely getting air in. Put an old brass one on and it inflated in under a minute. The trigger is VERY small compared to others and basically is only good for the ball inflator. The end connector will only fit tiny attachments like the ball inflator. Most items had little weight to them and some look more like plastic. Just cheap garbage overall. These are basically disposable attachments. If you are even remotely serious about your tools, spend a few extra bucks and get something better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Thumper

customer_reviews.title: It works if your in a pinch, not recommended for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a descent starter set or if your in a pinch set. It does not come with tape you’d need to wrap the fittings. The tire inflator is plastic, so be careful not to over tighten and break it while putting the hose attachment/fitting on it. The blow gun requires putting the attachment on it (with small hole) in order to attach the ball inflator or pointed end to blow, which is odd why it wasn’t just made to fit the two attachments, by passing the attachment with the holes. Overall, it’s ok for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Family_Guy_77

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory kit for any air compressor
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders with my little air compressor. Makes it so much easier to fill up tires by using the long connection. It was a pain having to try to fit the smaller connection my compressor came with in between wheel spokes to fill up my kids' bike tires. Plus, with the quick connections, I'm able to switch from airing up tires to airing up air mattresses or basketballs in a flash. However, I would recommend some thread tape be handy as air was leaking out of the adapter at the threads when I put this on my compressor. Thread tape fixed that problem quick.
customer_reviews.author: William Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn't what it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, after four moves within a handful of years, I misplaced a lot of the pieces in my original Campbell-Hausfeld set. I bought this as a replacement, but all of the parts included in the package feel much cheaper (lighter) than what I used to own. In fact, a few of the parts I originally had were made of brass, not whatever metal these are made of, and feel much nicer. I'm not confident this set will hold up. Yet it was the only name-brand set I could find here on Amazon (aside from the offshore junk with the unpronounceable names).
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job with some tradeoffs
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, it'll do the job. Definitely would not recommend for serious jobs or daily use. I occasionally use my compressor maybe once a month, and even then it annoys me a bit. The main issue is that it leaks air from some of the parts; almost all of them in my case. Can't be my line otherwise all attachments would leak. I've tightened it to what I can without damaging and theres always some leak. Just hope you dont have my luck.
customer_reviews.author: M.Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and I don't mean the price.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the nipples will not thread onto the accessories, when they do start threading they won't go on very far and, no I did not cross thread. Even the ones that do go on leak air around the threads even when using thread tape to seal the joint. If these are made of brass they are a different brass than I've ever seen before. Since they were inexpensive I'll probably not return them, too much of a hassle for a $13 item.
customer_reviews.author: Shikadin

customer_reviews.title: Not brass and they leak
customer_reviews.text: Misleading description, the only thing metal in this pack is the quick connect adapter, everything else is either plastic or low grade aluminum. The inflator barely engages on standard schrader valves requiring excessive pressure and the quick connect adapter (the only actual metal/brass component in the entire pack) leaks on every tool I insert and the gauge is made out of plastic. The price is right, but beware, you get what you pay for with this bottom of the line kit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: OK set, need teflon tape to work properly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these considering my grandfather used Campbell Hausfeld years ago and he told me they were the best. I guess times have changed and quality has gone downhill a bit. They work fine but they HAVE to have Teflon applied to each joint. If not you will hear hissing and lose pressure. They don't have a "quality" feel as well but so far they haven't let me down. Price is right and if your an occasional user like myself these should do just fine, but buy Teflon!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Young

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Air Tool Attachments
customer_reviews.text: I bought an air compressor but no ancillary attachments by mistake. Got these as 'hold me over' until I could research more expensive options. However, these are actually holding up with some pretty heavy duty work. My only complaint is that the seals on the hose attachment come loose easily. That said, I'm using this in extreme conditions so these should do exceptionally in normal conditions. I've been using my set with an air hammer to complete a hardwood floor project.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seem's good!
customer_reviews.text: Some the question's asked aren't well thought out. Durability, hello, I just got is how would I know? Value also depends on how well each item works over time... So looks good in the packaging, company has a good reputation, about $1 per item in the pack for the price I paid so pretty good up front value. The use over time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brainerd

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better set with a case of some sort
customer_reviews.text: This was cheap, and the parts are all there, but the utter lack of any kind of case to hold the numerous parts makes it not really worth it to me. It comes in a cheap vacuum formed but of plastic you will destroy opening up. That means you’ll probably end up dumping the various nozzles into a black hole of a tool box or drawer, eventually losing half the set (if you’re like me, anyway!).
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Crude sizes, manufacturing variance, can leak
customer_reviews.text: Not the best move if you need durability in the shop. Wiil work but hard to modulate the blower device. Inflator OK on only car tire type air valves. Did not work on bicycle Presta fittings. Crudely fabricated and plated so making connections requires teflon tape always. Not precision stuff here.
customer_reviews.author: CI

customer_reviews.title: Don't... Just don't
customer_reviews.text: I advise that you avoid this and pick up something of higher quality. The metal is extremely flimsy, the threads are super stiff, the fitment is very bad, and the utility is poor. Leaks everywhere, even with Teflon tape. I don't expect this to last nearly enough to recoup the cost, but I preemptively decided to toss it and get a better alternative.
customer_reviews.author: didnotask

customer_reviews.title: Broke out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The quick disconnect has barrings that fall out as soon as you pull the sleeve back they fall out on the floor don'y buy this set its crap I have no idea how this got so many positive reviews it is a terrible piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price! You need teflon tape to ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price! You need teflon tape to keep air from leaking and two wrenches to secure them. One part goes to your air-hose and turns it into a quick change type connection. The other parts use the male end of the quick change to install the blower, inflater, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper at Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Same product at Walmart for 5 dollars less. Product is minimal in quality and includes items that I've not used in over a year - never used since purchase.....would be better to buy individual tools as needed.
customer_reviews.author: AM/FM

customer_reviews.title: quality of the product is just ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was going to be all i needed for my compressor, but after installing it I realized it was a low quality product the tire filling tool is cheap and has no pressure button and can not be connected to pressure handle, had i known i would have bought a different kit.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card

customer_reviews.title: Compressor Inflation Kit
customer_reviews.text: A very handy 17 piece inflation kit with all types of required hardware to inflate just about any thing you need to inflate. Saves time and trips to the hardware store. This is a great adder to a general tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Stearns

customer_reviews.title: This seems like a decent kit for a DIY or home user
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a decent kit for a DIY or home user. I would probably want something more substantial if I used these fittings every day in my job. I tested a couple of the fittings and found no air leakage like others have reported. Although I did use PTFE tape and wrench tightened all the fittings. I tested this set on a brand new Porter Cable pancake compressor and a brand new 3/8" air hose.
customer_reviews.author: Maine Geek

customer_reviews.title: It works good for the most part
customer_reviews.text: When I actually got everything tightened up so that it wasn't leaking its pretty good although the stem for the tire valves got stuck partially open after a few uses and took a couple of good knocks to get it back into position again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: If you're new to compressors, buy this. It has all the converters you need to be able to just pop in and pop out a tool. Otherwise you have to screw on and screw off any tool you want to use. I wish it came with more female tool tips, as it only came with two, but it the one it came with work well. I have no leak issues or anything like that. Highly recommended to anyone buying a basic air compressor for home use.
customer_reviews.author: B. Herrin

customer_reviews.title: Good price on a nice air compressor coupler assortment.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few of these, as they contained an assortment of the connectors, tips, etc, that I needed for use with 2 different air compressors I have. Bought during an amazon sale, so it costs less than buying same set locally at walmart. Worked fine with bot of my compressors. Connectors worked well and threaded parts fit well. No problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: DISenchanted

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: For the price you get a lot of fittings. It pictured brass fittings which there aren't any so it's not what's pictured. The tire gauge air gun and tire chuck all feel like plastic. But the fittings are good. They don't leak. If I paid more than the $7-8 dollars I would have returned it. So for the price it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: some of the items came busted but the things i wanted/needed have worked well, the connectors and hand air nozzel
customer_reviews.author: Bryahna Brewster

customer_reviews.title: these will do just fine for you
customer_reviews.text: They are kind of cheap feeling but if you use your air compressor on occasion as a shade tree mechanic/carpenter, these will do just fine for you. Make sure you use some PTFE tape on the threads and there are no leaks. The assembly is a piece of cake and all the components work just fine. There are better ones out there but if you don't do it every single day or even give it heavier than normal use, these will do just fine for you and save you some money as well. I'd definitely buy again if I needed more fittings.
customer_reviews.author: Sameer

customer_reviews.title: so I feel a little bad about marking it down from 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Expect to use some Teflon tape on the threads to prevent leaking. I'm not sure that should be considered a defect, so I feel a little bad about marking it down from 5 stars. The feel in your hand is not as solid as what I had anticipated (the part with the trigger) so I don't know how that will hold up. Pressure gauge is not made of metal but worked as expected. I bought the kit for the tire inflator, which worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable...
customer_reviews.text: The connectors are all great. The down fall to me was the cheap coil hose. While installing the ends the hose kinked. Not a huge deal just really cheap plasic hose doesn't stretch out all the way because of the cheapness. Other than that the conn is ctions all work great.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great budget starter set! Use Teflon tape on threads though to prevent leaks!
customer_reviews.text: So far I have had no issues. Works well for the price. I do suggest to use some Teflon or PTFE tape to wrape around the threads to help create a better seal. I did not use any and have a slight leak and will be picking up some tape to rectify that.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these add-ons to use with a new pancake compressor. They're decent quality and get the job done. Wish it came with a storage case of some sort, but no complaints otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: ShokeyDokey

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great little kid can't beat what you get for the price we bought it specifically to make blowing up pool floats easier in the summertime and we use it with our Craftsman pancake air compressor
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to inflate anything I can find an orifice that will accommodate these nozzles. You’ve been warned
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheap construction!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap construction... the tire pressure gauge is so light and flimsy that when I tried to check my tire pressure it gave me a much higher reading than possible so I checked with another gauge I have and got the correct reading...doubt these accessories will last very long...
customer_reviews.author: Euclid

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, has most everything.
customer_reviews.text: I like the set, it is what I wanted. I haven't used it yet since the tracking said it was delivered on Saturday and I didn't receive it until today, Tuesday.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: As others have noted, the actual kit that I ...
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, the actual kit that I received dud not match the picture in the description. The 1/4 male female coupler is missing. But there are two of the needle inflators.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Tire chuck does not work, the rest seems to be OK.
customer_reviews.text: As others have pointed out, the air chuck does not let any air pass through, and you can't inflate tires with it. I dock them one star for that, otherwise I would have given them five stars. The rest seems to work OK, the fittings fit and if you seal them properly they don't leak. But the tire chuck is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Zootal

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! Includes everything I needed to connect up to my Porter-Cable 6 Gal. 150 PSI Portable Electric Air Compressor. Needed to add Teflon tape to all of the quick disconnect fittings but that is standard for all air compressor products.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory kit!
customer_reviews.text: This accessory kit has many options to use with an air compressor. It would be perfect if it came with some kind of case to keep them in. Just a simple pouch of some kind would be great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: works and has all you need
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was too much until the grand kids came and I had to inflate the swim inflatables. I did buy another tire gauge with the inflater all in one piece for autos. system snaps easily and does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Mac. McD.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of accessories
customer_reviews.text: Was a perfection addition to little portable air tank. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Leora Bloom

customer_reviews.title: The quality control isn't the best but you already knew that
customer_reviews.text: I really only needed the air blower nozzle, but as a cheap add on item why the heck not have some other components lying around. The quality control isn't the best but you already knew that.
customer_reviews.author: William Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Works with porter cable
customer_reviews.text: Must have for air compressors. Works well with porter cable to inflate tires, add a stapler/nailer (not included). Provides all the connections needed to easily connect and disconnect a hose (not included).
customer_reviews.author: VitaTTop Contributor: Sunglasses

customer_reviews.title: Not real impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.text: They work but the quality of the metal and quality control is lacking. Some of the threading is marginal at best and are a pain to attach to any equiptment. Cambell Hausfeld's kit is made in China......Maybe that's the reason for the poor quality control
customer_reviews.author: Geebee

customer_reviews.title: Threading is a bit dirty feeling
customer_reviews.text: I have had better...but these will work. The threading just feels pretty messy and the blower is pretty flimsy feeling. I would probably look for another set if I decided to buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B.

customer_reviews.title: A nice little starter kit for when you first get a ...
customer_reviews.text: A nice little starter kit for when you first get a compressor. I've used the air spray nozzle countless times and the fittings have come in handy for using getting new tools ready for use. Make sure you have teflon pipe tape too to seal the fittings!
customer_reviews.author: Rektakular

customer_reviews.title: Good set of parts
customer_reviews.text: Good set of parts, the QC's seem to hold the air quite well (up to 100PSI or so is what I've tested so far). The only issue is that I wish the hand valve had the same input and output sizes so I could use it with all acessories - instead it is only good for using on inflation of sports balls and other small needle/port inflation items.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Morilak

customer_reviews.title: Leaks.
customer_reviews.text: It leaks. Sure, you can use tape to fix that, but I don't expect leaks right out of the box. At least ship tape with it if it's a known problem.
customer_reviews.author: William Berard

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hose sprung a leak on first use.
customer_reviews.text: The hose is cheap plastic and sprung a leak after first use making it worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Agapemou

customer_reviews.title: Kept leaking air
customer_reviews.text: Product kept leaking air and the quality felt poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: CMR

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Someone gave me a nice compressor but I didn't have a hose or and fittings or attachments to use. This is a nice little starter kit! Had fittings to connect my new hose to compressor and everything else I needed to get started with small tasks. Quality doesn't seem bad, but I don't really abuse tools. *Get some thread seal tape for the threads, otherwise you'll probably get some air leaking at connections*
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Good for non professional use
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this would be good in a garage or for heavy use. Feels chitzy.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya D.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product... get something else somewhere else.
customer_reviews.text: Bad product cheaply made. Flimsy metal. Top of pressure gauge shot off on first tire I used it on. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Jallen

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit lots of options
customer_reviews.text: Had exactly what I needed in it and a whole bunch of other pieces. They seem to hold up fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Great seller kit not bad
customer_reviews.text: First set Tire guage blew up on firt try replaced whole kit because of it. ?Don't know if new guage is any better but with the replacement of intier kit how can i complain. Did not have to return broken guage or other parts of first kit, so ended up with two kits. A ok seller
customer_reviews.author: sol

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the accessories you'll need for a 1/4" hose
customer_reviews.text: This kit is cheap and has good quality connectors minus the fact that they're not brass. If you don't mind not having brass, this set is a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. The handle where it pivots on the air gun is a little sloppy and the tire inflater seemed a little cheap but they work great, Didn't try the tire checker yet but all the other stuff is fine, nothing leaks.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and mislabeled
customer_reviews.text: Fittings leak and parts aren't labeled correctly. This is junk. I can't use it out of the packages as advertised and will be buying another kit that is higher quality. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: compressor connections
customer_reviews.text: Got enough connections for the pancake compressor. Its nice having tire fill options and pressure tester. If buying a compressor but don't know what accessories to get, get this one. It has everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmama

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for most uses
customer_reviews.text: Overall good kit. Just make sure you have some sealing tape for threads.
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher Coffman

customer_reviews.title: A Necessary Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Accessory Kit as a necessity for the aluminum tanked California Air Compressor I also bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Handy set
customer_reviews.text: Used several of the pieces to do things like pump up tires and fill kids balloons. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: can't get a good seal son half of these items
customer_reviews.text: I've even used plumber's tape with little success. Not a good product I am sorry to say.
customer_reviews.author: IamAlex

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit with everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit for a Bosch air compressor. It’s a great kit with everything you could need.
customer_reviews.author: MattReader

customer_reviews.title: Accessory Kit, 17 Piece Compressor Inflation Kit
customer_reviews.text: This 17 piece kit puts the final touches on the Bostitch BTFP02012 6 gallon compressor I ordered. The quality is great. I'd highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Duch

customer_reviews.title: These are cheaply made as reflected in their price. ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cheaply made as reflected in their price. Avoid getting them if you can. My order was received with a broken air gauge ...
customer_reviews.author: The Garveys

customer_reviews.title: Campbell Hausfeld 17-Piece Air Tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set my new compressor that I got on Amazon it is cheap but it works well same product that was sold at Harbor freight company .
customer_reviews.author: DONALD M.

customer_reviews.title: Add thread tape to the kit
customer_reviews.text: The kit is great, I wish there was a small spool of thread tape included
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap low quality crap. Almost feel like they’re made out of plastic. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Scheel

customer_reviews.title: can't expect much for the price
customer_reviews.text: tools had to be made fit, but for the money ok!
customer_reviews.author: Constanze Steegmiller

customer_reviews.title: ehhh
customer_reviews.text: tire gage is plastic and it broke on the first time using it but its easy to put it together and at any moment it can fall apart again, the air chuck is making a weird noice on the inside of it but it still works and doesnt leak, so far ehh
customer_reviews.author: CH3V

customer_reviews.title: perfect for home!
customer_reviews.text: just grate kit with everything you will need for home use from basket balls to car tires!
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto A.

customer_reviews.title: Also the fitting is not the best (can feel the air seeping out under pressure) but ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had an attachment that would actually clamp down on or latch onto a valve stem. Also the fitting is not the best (can feel the air seeping out under pressure) but maybe the is an issue with the hose I have.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great attachments to have
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have them you can fill just about anything with air.
customer_reviews.author: crabapple

customer_reviews.title: Easy hook up
customer_reviews.text: Everything works good and easy to connect the one thing that would make this better is if it had a piece that would air up bike tires. As we have Mt bikes and road bike this would be great.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK LOZANO

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Everything in the kit is ok except the hand air release tool leaks air and the compressor can not keep up.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Tire inflate piece was broken Tire gauge does not work. The chuck you use to clean with the attachment does fit ? I will buy a set from some other company.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Overall I am satisfied with this
customer_reviews.text: Although I was not fond of the packaging for the price, the items have so far held up and they all get the job done. Overall I am satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: D8210

customer_reviews.title: Tightening the crap out of these and air is still leaking out ...
customer_reviews.text: Tightening the crap out of these and air is still leaking out slowly causing generator to be used more frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nord

customer_reviews.title: Working great on my portable Campbell air compressor
customer_reviews.text: I had to wrap some plumbers tape around the connector end as the air leaked a bit. Working great on my portable Campbell air compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Good Price but too many redundant fittings
customer_reviews.text: Price is good, quality is decent. But I noticed too many redundant fittings, could have include other fitting to expand its usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kao

customer_reviews.title: Best kit for someone who has a small portable air compressor
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything you need to use a basic air compressor. Even comes with extra quick disconnect fittings in case you get a tool that doesn't have one.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Moore

customer_reviews.title: Junk. The pieces that are suppose to be connected ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk. The pieces that are suppose to be connected do not even fit together. None of the plugs screw all the way in to either the blowgun or the chuck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: About what you'd expect...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, everything was there, and the pieces I have used have worked. They feel cheap and I've already had one piece fail. Not sure why, but one of the couplers just stopped working after 4-5 hours. Bottom line, this set is a good way to get up and running fast and cheap, but, eventually you will need to upgrade to better pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jbd

customer_reviews.title: Cheap stuff. Even for the price, it's cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap stuff. Even for the price, it's cheap stuff. It does what it says it does, but these chucks are not what I would rely on, on a regular basis. I am using them as spares in my truck, which will be used next to never. They will probably work well for that. The fittings are decent steel fittings and keep this a 3 star buy.
customer_reviews.author: terraformer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better quality, but good kit overall
customer_reviews.text: Its okay. Not great quality, but has all the components I needed in the kit for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Arter

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more and get a better kit. The main problem is the threading
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this kit is a piece of junk. Spend a little more and get a better kit. The main problem is the threading. Because the items are not properly threaded, a seal is not established. Therefore, there's a leak. Where there's a leak, there's less pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: good set to have for when you need to inflate ...
customer_reviews.text: good set to have for when you need to inflate ect. and you can't find your Milton brand parts which are superior with a price to go along
customer_reviews.author: J. Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Air compressor parts
customer_reviews.text: Durable, accurate description, I have not had any issues in the 3 months that I've h been d the product
customer_reviews.author: beaner

customer_reviews.title: nice kit.  I like it
customer_reviews.text: everything that I need to keep my tires in check as well as other uses. nice buy
customer_reviews.author: bonniefl

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Quality is pretty low. But it was not very expensive. In all fairness, all the pieces work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: I mean these work for light duty or hobby level ...
customer_reviews.text: I mean these work for light duty or hobby level but dont buy these if you are buying for daily shop use. The connectors are ok but you can really see the quality or lack there of in the tire inflator and air duster
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: Pressure-Schmessure
customer_reviews.text: Everything was just like the picture. Works fine. The pressure gauge was cheap and did not work.....but I was kinda expecting that (thus the minus one star). The "pull switch" is what I needed, so glad I got this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Sleuth

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with its adequacy.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It does the job. Parts feel kinda chintzy so I don't know how long it might last. The parts seem like they are die cast metal using the same metal as a Hot Wheels chassis. About the leaks you may experience with this set, use teflon tape to seal the thread.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Peck

customer_reviews.title: Basic starter kit, good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic kit which works as designed. The tire gauge is a bit flimsy but it works. All other components seem to be of good quailty. I do wish they would have thrown in a small roll of Teflon tape (or other thread sealer) since it is needed to use any of the connectors. Overall, its a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: orion

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made, haven’t used all but those I have work well
customer_reviews.author: Mogens Wassermann

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: same as the other one star reviews. not brass, and they all leak. the fittings wont even fit/not leak with others fittings in the same set.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton S.

customer_reviews.title: it works fine and the price is good
customer_reviews.text: This kit is okay for lite duty use. If your a home owner who just needs a few air compressor accessories then buy this set, it works fine and the price is good. If your a shop you probably know this kit isn't designed for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Emily

customer_reviews.title: With a Lil Help
customer_reviews.text: Good product but beware this is not commercial grade. At about $20 you get what you pay for. You'll need to use sealant tape (white tape) that seals two threads together for leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Svengali

product_meta.title: Accessory Kit, 17 Piece Compressor Inflation Kit, with Blow Gun, Air Chucks, & Inflation Needles (Campbell Hausfeld MP284701AV)
product_meta.description: The Campbell Hausfeld 17-piece industrial accessory kit (MP284700AV) is a perfect addition to any air compressor or air tool. This accessory kit includes a blowgun, 5 – 50 PSI gauge, dual-foot chuck, 1/4-inch NPT (F) coupler, (4) 1/4-inch NPT (M) plugs, (2) 1/4-inch NPT (F) plugs, female coupling, (2) male couplings, (2) inflation nozzles, safety nozzle and tapered nozzle. This kit is a must have when tackling any projects involving your compressor. Finish your projects faster and easier with Campbell Hausfeld. The Air Power Expert.
feature_bullets: Includes gauge, chuck, 1/4-in. NPT (F) coupler, (4) 1/4-in. NPT (M) plugs, (2) 1/4-in. NPT (F) plugs, female coupling, (2) male couplings, (2) inflation nozzles, safety nozzle & tapered nozzle
A great starter kit for inflation and tool connection; perfect for a variety of inflation needs and a must have for a new compressor
Components are made of durable brass meant to handle repetitive use making the MP284700AV very reliable
Finish your projects faster and easier with Campbell Hausfeld. The Air Power Expert.
